about_the_game:
Welcome to another galaxy. This demo of Project Coreward is an open world role playing adventure with limited gameplay.

Upgrade your ship. Assemble and train its crew. Their mission? To survive, explore and eventually uncover the ancient choices that now weigh darkly on the fate of every world.

Project Coreward features an extensive galaxy created for VR. Guide your ship through the stars in 3rd person and explore large scale solar systems and vast, walkable planets. Recruit crewmembers, engage in diplomacy and combat, and upgrade your skills and your vessel to survive.

Project Coreward is inspired by the classic PC sandbox adventure, Starflight and is the work of a sole developer. This demo features approximately 1.5 hours of story driven gameplay, with a unique plotline and personality.
detailed_description:
Just Updated

You may notice a HUGE UPDATE to this old, but not-forgotten store page!


That's because Project Coreward, the completion of Exoplanet, is releasing in mid-January 2024. This is the real deal! Project Coreward is a 10 hour plus open-world RPG and the culmination of years of work. It is the full Exoplanet experience extended, rebranded and REBUILT.

Project Coreward features the total story line with new characters, environments and much more.

Exoplanet will become a free demo of the full Project Coreward game which will be available very soon.

One final note, if you'd like "Exoplanet" back, opt into the beta version of the game in your steam library.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 or Equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4500 MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR, Stationary or Room Scale, Tracked Controllers
pc_requirements.recommended:

  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700 / AMD Ryzen 7 2700 or Equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1080 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4500 MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR, Stationary or Room Scale, Tracked Controllers

short_description: Embark on an epic journey across the stars while encountering foes, friends and forgotten stories. Build your ship. Recruit and train your crew. Exoplanet is a demo of Project Coreward, a full open world RPG.
